name: Murder, Bee Wrote
description:
A game made over the span of 46 hours for Magical Realism Jam, where you play as a murderer that switches places with a bumblebee.

Kill helpless bees using the stingers of their friends! In this endless runner, you must strive to kill as many bees as possible to earn the ultimate high score!

Art by Kate Olguin and Aidan Buffum

Audio by Kate Olguin

Programmed by Erik Cerini and Aidan Buffum
